dataList.dlg: Let’s visit the world of wonders.

The cleansing of all impermanence and detachment may be meaningless.
Still, I cast myself into that troubled world all the same.
I’ll tie you up just enough.
Ankle-to-ankle, clip… clop…
To bound over to the next world… Huzzah! Off we go!
Nothing says… that I must be located there… Heheh.
Tadaa~ Transformation complete! Hah, we've a boatload!
The seagulls... They keep crying and screaming away...!
It'll sting~ It won't come off once you're cut.
Filth nests inside me... so that they may be reborn as something useful.
A heart shaken by sorrow bursts... like this.
Cry with me... Let's cry until our bodies burst.
Run along the flow and voilà~ There you are!

Hahah! Gotcha~! This is what happens when
you don't know your place and run away, fugitive.
With solemn grace, I accept this deserved punishment.

With contemplation, I shall darken the clear skies above;
with my sacrifice, I shall exsanguinate my carnal blood upon this earth.

The heavens have spoken: this tarnished, filthy body has no skies to rise to… 
Oh, all the fell things in this world, remain here with me for eternity!

Faint lamplight spreads over the neatly folded paper;
a poem's brushstroke becomes a loong atop a dry inkstone.
A singular breath brings down the blue sky;
The fused reverberation shall resonate the bells of gloaming!
